metadata.title: USN-6123-1 -- Linux kernel (OEM) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Patryk Sondej and Piotr Krysiuk discovered that a race condition existed in the netfilter subsystem of the Linux kernel when processing batch requests, leading to a use-after-free vulnerability. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2023-32233)  Reima Ishii discovered that the nested KVM implementation for Intel x86 processors in the Linux kernel did not properly validate control registers in certain situations. An attacker in a guest VM could use this to cause a denial of service (guest crash). (CVE-2023-30456)  It was discovered that the Xircom PCMCIA network device driver in the Linux kernel did not properly handle device removal events. A physically proximate attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash). (CVE-2023-1670)  Jean-Baptiste Cayrou discovered that the shiftfs file system in the Ubuntu Linux kernel contained a race condition when handling inode locking in some situations. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (kernel deadlock). (CVE-2023-2612)  It was discovered that the NTFS file system implementation in the Linux kernel did not properly handle a loop termination condition, leading to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly expose sensitive information. (CVE-2023-26606)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6123-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-modules-iwlwifi-6.0.0-1017-oem - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-modules-6.0.0-1017-oem - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-buildinfo-6.0.0-1017-oem - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-headers-6.0.0-1017-oem - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-modules-ipu6-6.0.0-1017-oem - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-modules-ivsc-6.0.0-1017-oem - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-oem-6.0-tools-host - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-image-6.0.0-1017-oem - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-oem-6.0-tools-6.0.0-1017 - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-tools-6.0.0-1017-oem - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-image-unsigned-6.0.0-1017-oem - 6.0.0-1017.17 linux-oem-6.0-headers-6.0.0-1017 - 6.0.0-1017.17 No subscription required  linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1017.17 linux-headers-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1017.17 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1017.17 linux-image-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1017.17 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1017.17 linux-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1017.17 linux-tools-oem-22.04b - 6.0.0.1017.17 No subscription required
